fields.description:
The short sleeve Maratty Shirt is a bold statement piece for Spring Summer. The 'Palm Tree' design is reverse printed on a lightweight cotton chambray, creating a subtle, vintage appearance. Featuring a fresh colour palette of blue and green tones, this is a contemporary take on the classic Hawaiian shirt.

— Short sleeve shirt
— Reverse printed cotton chambray
— Button down collar
— Branded buttons
— Chest pocket detail
— Tonal top stitching
fields.name: SHORT SLEEVE BLUE MARATTY SHIRT

fields.description:
This season we've handpicked our favourite Liberty Arts Fabric and worked this into the Spring Summer collection. Inspired by paisley motifs, this is a refreshing addition to your wardrobe. The 'Paisley Tears' print is part of the Tana Lawn collection at Liberty and features an all over dense paisley floral pattern in a bold palette.

— Liberty Arts Fabric
— Lightweight cotton
— All over paisley design
— Button down collar
— Chest pocket detail
— Complete with branded buttons
fields.name: SHORT SLEEVE ECRU LEASIDE SHIRT

fields.description:
Introducing the new Gresham Weave Boot for SS16. Handmade and neatly crafted from a super soft textured mossback suede and natural crepe sole. The classic lace-up design works a stitch down construction, full leather cushioned interior and complete with a branded embossed leather floret.

— Suede sourced in Europe
— Mossback suede upper
— Natural crepe sole
— Lace-up design
— Hand crafted
— Stitchdown construction
— Leather cushioned interior
Handmade in Northern Portugal using traditional Portuguese shoe making techniques that haven’t changed for generations.
fields.name: TAN GRESHAM WEAVE BOOTS

fields.description:
The Alton Sunglasses are a a 70’s inspired flat-top design, immaculately constructed from acetate. Featuring shiny double pins on the temples and metal branding intricately inlaid on the arm. These over sized bold frames are stylish, modern and designed to transform your everyday attire.

— Hand crafted 
— Signature branded
— Black acetate frames and arms
— Offers maximum UV protection
— Filter category 3
Dimensions:
Lens width: 5 cm
Arm length: 14 cm

Frame — 100% Acetate
Lens — CR39
fields.name: BLACK ALTON SUNGLASES

fields.description:
The iconic Mayfair Trench Coat is a classic, timeless all year round staple piece inspired by heritage and military elements. Come rain or shine, the iconic trench can be worn all year round, combining functionality and style. Transcend your summer attire this season.

— Crafted from a cotton blend
— Lightweight construction
— Streamlined silhouette
— Concealed front button fastening
— Pronounced collar
— Signature branded corozo buttons
— Front storm flap detail
— Adjustable button cuffs
— Back storm flap
— Single vent
fields.name: NAVY MAYFAIR TRENCH

fields.description:
A functional piece of outerwear for the season and a modern twist on the classic lightweight summer jacket, working multiple functions and designed with style and versatility in mind. Features an adjustable length utility function, ideal for customizing your look and designed to be worn mid length or short depending on your needs. Also features internal elasticated straps designed for wearing round your shoulders, making holding your jacket no longer a hassle.

— Lightweight construction
— Classic, relaxed fit
— Concealed front zip fastening
— Additional button fastening
— Hood with cotton drawstring cords
— Tonal stitching
— Signature branded corozo buttons
— Adjustable button cuffs
— Adjustable length utility function
— Elasticated internal straps
fields.name: RED CLAYDON JACKET

fields.description:
The Printed Tarbet Hooded Jacket is a classic staple for the season, crafted in a lightweight printed cotton. The large front pockets and drawstring adjustments combine function with comfort, making this a hardworking garment. Cut in a relaxed loose hippy style and adorned in a vintage 60's paisley print.

— Indigo dyed and lazer printed cotton
— Washed and garment dyed for a vintage appearance
— Full front zip fastening
— Concealed front placket
— Hood with functional drawstring cords
— Four large pockets with push stud fastening
— Tonal stitch detail
— Contrast zig zag stitch detail on sleeve
— Elasticated cuffs
— Internal pocket
fields.name: BLUE PRINTED TARBET HOODED JACKET
